item.title: A framework for creating value
item.description: The main goal of someone working in the technology space (or any knowledge worker to be fair) is value creation. Either to the organization you are in or to the market. So I’ll explain how I’m currently thinking about it. A framework In my opinion, the process of value creation has the following stages: Step 1: Learning Learning is food for our knowledge and skills, which are needed in the next 2 steps.
